statements: SELECT id, user_id, data_entry_permission, data_update_permission FROM RegulatoryRequirements;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, data_entry_permission FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_entry_permission = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_entry_permission = TRUE OR data_update_permission = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id FROM RegulatoryRequirements ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, data_entry_permission FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_entry_permission = TRUE
SELECT user_id, data_update_permission FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_update_permission = FALSE
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_entry_permission = TRUE AND data_update_permission = FALSE
SELECT id, user_id FROM RegulatoryRequirements WHERE data_entry_permission = TRUE OR data_update_permission = TRUE
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data;
SELECT id, data_entry FROM regulatory_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_logs WHERE log_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT data_entry, regulatory_trigger FROM regulatory_data WHERE regulatory_trigger = TRUE;
SELECT MAX(log_time), COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_logs GROUP BY data_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data_entry FROM regulatory_data WHERE regulatory_trigger = true;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT rd.id, rd.data_entry, rl.log_time FROM regulatory_data AS rd JOIN regulatory_logs AS rl ON rd.id = rl.data_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE data_entry ILIKE '%example%' AND regulatory_trigger = false;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT description FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, trigger_name FROM triggers WHERE operation_type = 'insert';
SELECT * FROM data_updates WHERE data_type = 'customer' ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT id, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT trigger_name, operation_type FROM triggers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM data_updates WHERE update_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, data_type, update_time FROM data_updates ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT id, name FROM table2 WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, account_number, balance FROM table4 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, price, quantity FROM table2 WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM table3 WHERE user_id = 1001 AND action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM table1 WHERE id = 100 OR id = 200 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM table2 WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM table3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM table4 WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_date, table_name FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
